name: @textus/embedded
description: TextUs Embedded is a library used for generating TextUs iframes to be displayed within your web app.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && typedoc src/index.ts
scripts.build:development: npm run build && dotenvx run -f .env.development -- node scripts/build.js
scripts.build:production: npm run build && dotenvx run -f .env.production -- node scripts/build.js

author: TextUs Team
